event.name: FRONTIER_ELITE_INSULT
event.text:
You arrive at the beacon to see a particularly well-armed Elite Rebel jump in shortly afterwards, their shields seemingly offline. You receive a hail from their captain, an MFK Ace, who proceeds to keel over laughing at the sight of your ship. "So THIS is the Renegade command's been sending ships everywhere to find? HA! I would've thought you'd be some sort of flagship or mega cruiser, not this little wimp!" The Ace continues prattling on about your ship's relative incompetence and how their grandpa could suplex a train and so on, seemingly too engrossed in roasting you to notice their shields being down.
Begin combat.
The Rebel captain smirks at you precociously as you hear their weapons system starting to heat up. "Ah Renegades, predictable as always. Prepare to be crushed, squirt."
You interrupt the captain by firing your weapons directly into their weapons, creating a massive explosion that rocks their ship to the core. The MFK Ace's haughty disposition quickly fades away, replaced by one of shock and fear. "Alright alright, you've made your point - you're quick on the draw and all. Would a bit of scrap suffice to let us go?" Accept their surrender. scrap_only
Ignore her and begin combat.
